name: Introduction to Software Development
content: Overview of software development lifecycle, software engineering principles, and agile methodologies.
preread: Review articles on software development methodologies.
taskDetails: Prepare a case study on a successful software development project.

name: Version Control with Git
content: Fundamentals of version control, Git basics, branching strategies, and collaborative workflows.
sessionDetails: Hands-on workshop with Git commands and GitHub.
taskDetails: Collaboratively work on a GitHub repository to understand branching and merging.

name: Web Development Basics
content: Introduction to HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, building static web pages, and understanding client-server architecture.
preread: Review HTML, CSS, and JavaScript syntax.
sessionDetails: Live coding session building a simple website.
taskDetails: Build a personal portfolio website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Introduction to Object-Oriented Programming
content: Fundamentals of OOP, classes, objects, inheritance, polymorphism, and encapsulation.
taskDetails: Implement a simple object-oriented program modeling real-world entities.

name: Database Design and SQL
content: Basics of database design, relational database concepts, SQL queries for data manipulation and retrieval.
preread: Familiarize with SQL syntax and basic database concepts.
sessionDetails: Practical exercises on creating and querying databases.
taskDetails: Design a database schema for a simple e-commerce application and write SQL queries.
